description: blue with floral embroidered boots with gold braid and sequins on green and gold brocade, part of which is applied to red and pink feet; braid attaches boots to pants; red, pink, purple, green, blue; stiff tan sole; two 10" tied on back of bib
title: Pair of Baby's Pants
